title: Olympia Visibility Brigade
description: We organize protests on overpasses and support Capitol protests. Join us for a special event with signs, flags, and fun activities.
raw_text:
Impatient for the next big protest? Us too! Join us weekly to make good trouble! 
OLYMPIA VISIBILITY BRIGADE 
We deploy each weekend on overpasses in the Olympia-Tumwater-Lacey area 
We also deploy on Mondays during evening rush hour 
We support Capitol protests when possible 
Bring your high-viz protest signs, flags, fun costumes, a good mood, and be tolerant of terrible dancing. Introverts welcome! 
Upcoming Event: Monday, July 14th @ 4:30 – 6:30 pm 
The Kiss, Percival Landing, Olympia 
Look for upcoming Olympia Visibility Brigade events at theblop.org and backbonecampaign.org
raw_summary: Olympia Visibility Brigade invites people to join their protest efforts. They host events on overpasses during weekends and Mondays and encourage signs and costumes. An upcoming event is scheduled for Monday, July 14th at 4:30 pm at The Kiss, Percival Landing, Olympia.

title: Good Trouble Rally

Thursday
5pm to 7pm

Drive by and honk, stay for a few minutes, drop off donations, or stay the whole time!

Parking-Amtrak Aberdeen Station

DONATIONS OF DIAPERS, WIPES, AND DIAPERS CREAM FOR LOCAL FAMILIES

RESPECT EXISTENCE
OR 
EXPECT RESISTANCE

BE THE FIRST TO LEARN ABOUT AUGUST RALLY WHEN YOU DROP OFF A DONATION

title: Town Hall Announcement
description: We invite you to voice your concerns and have your questions answered regarding community and environmental issues by Commissioner Kowal and Rep. Benaroch.
raw_text:
ARE YOU CONCERNED ABOUT THE HAPPENINGS IN YOUR COMMUNITY
DO YOU HAVE ENVIRONMENTAL CONCERNS
WOULD YOU LIKE TO SEE POLICY CHANGES
VOICE YOUR CONCERNS & HAVE YOUR QUESTIONS ANSWERED.

TOWN HALL ANNOUNCEMENT:

WHO: COMMISSIONER KOWAL (R-DIST. 4) AND REP. BENARROCH (R-DIST. 81)

WHERE: NAPLES REGIONAL LIBRARY
